languages.text: Кассия жестоко подавила мятеж. Она отчаянно пыталась восстановить свой дом из руин и воссоздать столь неосмотрительно уничтоженный Атлас, но не преуспела и оставила пост Новатора, передав не желанный никем титул юной наследнице.

Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.
languages.original_text: Кассия жестоко подавила мятеж. Она отчаянно пыталась восстановить свой дом из руин и воссоздать столь неосмотрительно уничтоженный Атлас, но не преуспела и оставила пост Новатора, передав не желанный никем титул юной наследнице.

traits.locale_text: Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to restore her house from ruin and to recreate the Atlas that got destroyed so imprudently. She did not succeed. She left her Novator position and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to restore her house from ruin and to recreate the Atlas that got destroyed so imprudently. She did not succeed. She left her Novator position and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

languages.text: 卡西娅以铁腕手段镇压了叛乱，拼命地想把她的家族从衰颓中拯救出来，试图重塑那个被鲁莽摧毁的圣仪，然而命运却没有眷顾她。到最后，她放弃了大族长的位置，把这个她不想要的头衔传给了一位年轻的继承人。
languages.original_text: Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅以铁腕手段镇压了叛乱，拼命地想把她的家族从衰颓中拯救出来，试图重塑那个被鲁莽摧毁的圣仪，然而命运却没有眷顾她。到最后，她放弃了大族长的位置，把这个她不想要的头衔传给了一位年轻的继承人。

languages.text: Cassia zerschlug die Rebellion mit eiserner Faust. Sie versuchte verzweifelt, ihr Haus aus dem Ruin wiederauferstehen zu lassen und den Atlas nachzubauen, der so töricht zerstört worden war ... doch das Schicksal war nicht auf ihrer Seite. Schließlich legte sie das Amt der Novatorin nieder und gab den unerwünschten Titel an eine junge Erbin weiter.
languages.original_text: Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

traits.locale_text: Cassia zerschlug die Rebellion mit eiserner Faust. Sie versuchte verzweifelt, ihr Haus aus dem Ruin wiederauferstehen zu lassen und den Atlas nachzubauen, der so töricht zerstört worden war ... doch das Schicksal war nicht auf ihrer Seite. Schließlich legte sie das Amt der Novatorin nieder und gab den unerwünschten Titel an eine junge Erbin weiter.

languages.text: Cassia écrasa la rébellion d'une main de fer. Elle tenta désespérément de relever sa maison et de recréer l'Atlas qui fut si inconsidérément détruit, mais le destin ne l'entendait pas de cette oreille. Elle finit par renoncer à son rôle de Novator et transmit le titre à un jeune héritier.
languages.original_text: Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

traits.locale_text: Cassia écrasa la rébellion d'une main de fer. Elle tenta désespérément de relever sa maison et de recréer l'Atlas qui fut si inconsidérément détruit, mais le destin ne l'entendait pas de cette oreille. Elle finit par renoncer à son rôle de Novator et transmit le titre à un jeune héritier.

languages.text: Cassia aplastó la rebelión con mano de hierro. Intentó desesperadamente salvar a su casa de la ruina y recrear el Atlas cuya destrucción lamentaba, pero el destino no estaba de su parte. Finalmente, abandonó el puesto de Novator y legó el título que acabó detestando a una joven heredera.
languages.original_text: Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

traits.locale_text: Cassia aplastó la rebelión con mano de hierro. Intentó desesperadamente salvar a su casa de la ruina y recrear el Atlas cuya destrucción lamentaba, pero el destino no estaba de su parte. Finalmente, abandonó el puesto de Novator y legó el título que acabó detestando a una joven heredera.

languages.text: カシアは鉄の拳で反逆者を粉砕した。彼女は一族を滅亡からよみがえらせ、かくも愚かに滅ぼされたアトラスを再興させようと血眼になったが、運命はカシアに与（くみ）しなかった。彼女はやがてノベイターの任を解かれ、望まれぬ肩書きを若き後継者に託すことになった。
languages.original_text: Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

traits.locale_text: カシアは鉄の拳で反逆者を粉砕した。彼女は一族を滅亡からよみがえらせ、かくも愚かに滅ぼされたアトラスを再興させようと血眼になったが、運命はカシアに与（くみ）しなかった。彼女はやがてノベイターの任を解かれ、望まれぬ肩書きを若き後継者に託すことになった。

languages.text: Cassia, isyanı demir yumrukla bastırdı. Hanesini yıkıntılardan çıkarmak ve akılsızca yok edilen Atlas'ı yeniden yaratmak için muazzam bir çaba sarf etse de felek ona yâr olmadı. İlerleyen dönemlerde Rota Reisliği makamını bırakıp artık istemediği ünvanını genç bir vârise devretti.
languages.original_text: Cassia crushed the rebellion with an iron fist. She desperately tried to bring her House back from ruin and recreate the Atlas that had been so unwisely destroyed, but fate was not on her side. She eventually left the post of Novator and passed the unwanted title to a young heir.

traits.locale_text: Cassia isyanı demir yumrukla bastırdı. Hane'sini yıkıntılardan çıkarmak ve akılsızca yok edilen Atlas'ı yeniden yaratmak için muazzam çaba sarf etti ancak kader yanında değildi. İlerleyen dönemlerde Rota Reisi mevkisini bıraktı ve bu istenmeyen ünvanı genç bir vârise teslim etti.
